_header: Straight shall be the ways on him that beth sinful
_description: On the Terror of the Judgment — six couplets

OxfMert248.First Lines:
Streit shul be þe waies on hem þat beþ sinfulon
                    þe day of dome þat shal be so dredful…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…for to sewe hem þere strong shal it bebot nedes
                    buneþ hem sewe hemfor hi shullen na weder mo we fle
